name: Super meru-meru lightroad Deluxe
description:
Many worlds are at war... Nothing could soothe them.
Nothing but go-kart racing!!

Fight for your world in Super Meru-meru Lightroad Deluxe, an awesome party racing game! Play as an alien, a slime, or even a beefy Pikachu!

This game has been made by Cecile Jaubert aka. Zellk (art) and Jerome Bretheau aka. Callmemonamiral (code) for the Ludum Dare 30!
Some sound effects come from Mario Kart 64.
Some musics come from nosoapradio.us, one is from Sonic.

This game supports local multiplayer, but has no LAN/online multiplayer or AI opponents!
